591520.name: Evangeline™ Soundtrack
591520.description:
In this soundtrack, discover extended and altered versions of songs from the world of Evangeline™, including bonus tracks not originally featured in the game! All music composed by Ari Fisher.

Track list:

1. Main Menu - 03:47
2. Scene 1: Fresh Air - 03:57
3. Scene 2: Trash Day - 03:50
4. Scene 3: Extra! Extra! - 07:38
5. Scene 4: Snail Mail - 05:44
6. Scene 5: Packaged Deal - 03:53
7. Scene 6: Beyond The Veil - 03:52
8. Scene 7: Home - 03:50
9. Gabriel's Letter - 03:15
10. End Credits - 02:44
11. BONUS: Evangeline Main Theme - 02:41
12. BONUS: Flower Meter - 00:09
13. BONUS: Flower Meter 2 - 00:05
14. BONUS: Evangeline Launch Trailer - 00:30


Music will be placed in your Evangeline™ Steam install directory: Steam\steamapps\common\Evangeline™\Soundtrack\
591520.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
